about.title: About Me
about.bioText: I am a Computer Engineering student passionate about software, developing projects on modern web technologies and embedded systems. I aim to gain both a technical and global perspective by reinforcing my theoretical knowledge with international experiences.
about.internDesc: Worked on DSM-51 microcontroller architecture and developed image processing algorithms using Matlab libraries.
about.volleyDesc: Received professional volleyball training and participated in competitions at Doğuş Academy and SBSK (Sultangazi Municipality Sports Club).

1.title: Erasmus: Human Pose Estimation
1.desc: Real-time human figure tracking using MATLAB image processing.
1.longDesc: Developed during my Erasmus term in Poland using MATLAB Image Processing Toolbox. The system captures frame-by-frame images to track human figures. It analyzes body positions (Pose Estimation) to define activities in real-time. (Visual ref: thinkpalm.com)

2.title: Operating Systems Simulation
2.desc: Analysis of SJF and Round Robin scheduling algorithms.
2.longDesc: This project simulates SJF and Round Robin scheduling algorithms using C++. Using Arrival Time (AT) and Burst Time (BT) data, it calculates Completion Time (CT), Turn-Around Time (TAT), and Waiting Time (WT), visualized with Gantt charts.

3.title: Emu8086 Microprocessor Project
3.desc: Real-time clock application using 8086 Assembly language.
3.longDesc: Focusing on low-level programming, this project displays system time and date (Ex: 24/12/2025 - Wednesday) in real-time on an emulator screen. BIOS interrupts were actively used for memory management and hardware interaction.

4.title: Data Analysis & Algorithm Report
4.desc: Analysis of machine learning clustering algorithms.
4.longDesc: This study analyzes the effectiveness of K-Means and DBSCAN clustering algorithms on datasets, as well as the network optimization performance of Prim's and Dijkstra's algorithms. Memory usage and execution times were compared in detail.

5.title: Modern Web UI Design
5.desc: Responsive portfolio interface developed with HTML5 and CSS3.
5.longDesc: A modern, responsive portfolio interface built exclusively with HTML5 and CSS3. Using flexbox and grid layouts, the project focuses on cross-device compatibility and user-centric design experience.

6.title: GameSwipe: AI-Driven Recommendation
6.desc: Personalized game recommendation system using Python and ML.
6.longDesc: Developed with Python and advanced data processing libraries, this app analyzes user interactions frame-by-frame to offer personalized game suggestions. It learns user preferences over time using ML algorithms. Source code is private for commercial reasons.
